tool_description: Upcall provides phone callers through an API and web interface. Simply send us your phone numbers and our professional callers will call them for you within minutes. We are the next generation call center. Contact us for more info!

api_list.name: updateWebhook
createWebhook
fetchOauthAuthorizedApplications
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://upcall-upcall-v1.p.rapidapi.com/oauth/authorized_applications"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "upcall-upcall-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: fetchWebhook
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://upcall-upcall-v1.p.rapidapi.com/webhooks/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "upcall-upcall-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: revokeOauthAuthorizedApplication
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://upcall-upcall-v1.p.rapidapi.com/oauth/authorized_applications/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "upcall-upcall-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.delete(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
